artefact: Find your local Approved Tachograph Centre (ATC)

artefact.description: Find an Approved Tachograph Centre (ATC) to get your tachograph read
artefact.more_information: You will have to find the right centre for the type of tachograph you have - digital or analogue.
artefact.introduction: You can find an Approved Tachograph Centre (ATC) to have a  tachograph installed, calibrated or inspected.

details.description: Includes setting up test stations, employing drivers and becoming a vehicle operator

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
EU and GB Domestic rules for drivers of goods vehicles and passenger-carrying vehicles

artefact.title: Tachographs - rules for drivers and operators

details.description: Who needs to use a tachograph and exemptions; digital and analogue tachographs; guidance for goods vehicles, passenger carrying vehicles (PCVs) and light vehicles

artefact.title: Find your local approved speed limiter centre

details.description: Find a speed limiter centre to test or repair your speed limiter
